p:
For both vector species, variability was mainly observed in the relative human-to-mosquito transmission probability of exposed humans to symptomatically infected humans ( ρ), the mosquito density ( M
L ), the human population density ( M
L ) and the inverse of the mosquito lifespan ( μ
v )_used to estimate the overall R
hv . Variability was also principally observed in the relative human-to-human transmissibility of exposed humans to symptomatic humans ( K) and the inverse of the duration of extrinsic incubation period (
γ
v
) used in R
hh ( Fig 4).
